kjv_def: bear, beget, be born, bring forth, conceive, be delivered of, gender, make, spring
strongs_def: to procreate (properly, of the father, but by extension of the mother); figuratively, to regenerate
outline:
1. of men who fathered children
    1. to be born
    2. to be begotten
      1. of women giving birth to children
    3. metaph.
      1. to engender, cause to arise, excite
      2. in a Jewish sense, of one who brings others over to his way of life, to convert someone
      3. of God making Christ his son
      4. of God making men his sons through faith in Christ's work
